CustomField.description: Same as Conga_Template__c, but with "Signed" in the file name
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Type__c,"Generic") ,
"[Terms and Conditions (Signed)]"&Product__r.Generic_Terms_Conga_Template__c ,
IF( Generate_Disclosure_Form__c=true ,
"[Community Solar Agreement (Signed)]"&Product__r.Project_Specific_Conga_Template__c& IF(ISBLANK(Product__r.Disclosure_Form_Conga_Template__c),"",","&"[Solar Disclosure Form (Signed)]"&Product__r.Disclosure_Form_Conga_Template__c) ,
"[Community Solar Agreement (Signed)]"&Product__r.Project_Specific_Conga_Template__c
) )
CustomField.label: Conga Signed Template
